channel.title: CVE on Itarow
channel.description: Recent content in CVE on Itarow

item.title: Hackthebox - Armageddon - Write up
item.description: Hi everyone, I rooted the box “Armageddon” from HackTheBox. This box include exploitation of drupal, duplicate credentials with bad password, and malicious installation of snap package to gain root access. Foothold Let’s nmap the box : $ nmap -A -p- -T4 10.10.10.233 Starting Nmap 7.80 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2021-07-08 13:24 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.233 Host is up (0.064s latency). Not shown: 65533 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.

item.title: Hackthebox - Ophiuchi - Write up
item.description: I rooted Ophiuchi which was a medium Linux machine. It implicates a flaw with YAML which allow to RCE. Apache tomcat credentials free, and a sudo capability to run a go file. Foothold classic nmap : âžœ Ophiuchi nmap -A -p- -T4 10.10.10.227 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.1 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) 8080/tcp open http Apache Tomcat 9.0.38 |_http-open-proxy: Proxy might be redirecting requests |_http-title: Parse YAML Service Info: OS: Linux; CPE: cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel So we are going to see the HTTP port.

item.title: Hackthebox - Script_kiddie - Write up
item.description: So I rooted Script-Kiddie from HackTheBox, which was an easy Linux box. This box was create by 0xdf, thanks to him. It includes a CVE on msfvenom for Foothold, a crontab exploit for the lateral movement and a sudo authorization on metasploit for root part. Foothold First we start with a classic nmap scan : $ nmap -A -p- -T4 10.10.10.226 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.
